full_summary:
# Tender Announcement: Customized Hog Trailer

## Solicitation Details

* **Solicitation Number:** WS3878300379
* **Publication Date:** September 25, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** November 8, 2023, at 14:00 ET
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** TBA
* **Expected Contract End Date:** April 3, 2024

## Notice Type and Method

* **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price

## Tender Description

Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC), on behalf of Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada, invites proposals for the acquisition of a customized hog trailer, including delivery and training on its operation, in Sherbrooke, Quebec, Canada. The tender includes a detailed statement of requirements outlined in Annex "Statement of Requirements."

## Contracting Entities

* **Contracting Entity Name:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Contracting Entity Address:** 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada

## End User Entities

* **End User Entity Name:** Department of Agriculture and Agri-Food (AAFC)
* **End User Entity Address:** K.W. Neatby Bldg, 960 Carling Ave, Ottawa, Ontario K1Y 4X2, Canada

## Contact Information

* **Contact Person:** François S. Martineau (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Contact Email:** [francois.s.martineau@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:francois.s.martineau@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

## Notice URL and Attachment

* **Notice URL:** [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17543482?extsite=MTc1NDM0ODJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17543482?extsite=MTc1NDM0ODJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)
* **Attachment:** None

## Other Information

* This solicitation cancels and supersedes previous solicitation number Doc3878300434 dated June 12, 2023,
